featured.text: The hair and fur are made into mats and brooms and sent to 24 waters to absorb the oil.

definition.zh_def: 墊子；通常用於地面或其他表面上以提供舒適或保護的材料。
definition.en_def: A piece of material used on a floor or other surface for comfort or protection.
definition.example: She placed a mat by the door to keep the house clean.
